longBusinessSummary: Mawana Sugars Limited manufactures and sells sugar products in India and internationally. The company operates through Sugar, Power, and Distillery segments. It produces plantation white, refined, and specialty sugars, as well as IP grade sugar for pharmaceutical applications. In addition, the company is involved in the cogeneration of power from bagasse; and manufacturing and sale of anhydrous and hydrous ethanol, including rectified spirit, denatured spirit, fuel ethanol, organic manure, and fusel oil. The company was formerly known as Siel Limited and changed its name to Mawana Sugars Limited in January 2008. Mawana Sugars Limited was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Gurugram, India.
